entries.next: I don't have anything for you at the moment. I'll keep you in mind if anything arises.
entries.cantwork: I won't hire you until I can have your undivided attention. Finish up whatever business you're involved in, then see me.
entries.npc_reset_1: Fine.  I'll get someone else to do it then.
entries.notyet: I have no need of your services at this time.
entries.npc_1_1: Crider Trant. I represent the Corporate Sector Authority for the Naboo system. The name of the game is credits. Care to earn some? A government inspector is heading for one of my resource extraction plants. I'd like you to give him something to encourage him to, ah, delay his inspection. Just until I can make sure everything is up to code, of course. Interested?
entries.npc_3_1: That is disappointing, but I'm sure someone else will have a use for the money. Nice outfit. Be seeing you.
entries.npc_4_1: The usual mischief that primitive hooligans undertake to disrupt the honest businessman, like whining to the civil authorities about "improper disposal procedures" and "sacred places." A lot of superstitious nonsense. So, will you help me?
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Are you going to deliver these credits? Get going.
entries.npc_reward_1: Fine. It all went smoothly, I trust.
entries.npc_work_1: Haven't you delivered those credits yet?
entries.npc_noloc_1: Return here in a while, after I've made all the necessary arrangements.
entries.npc_failure_1: You failed? I guess neither of us will make anything from this deal.
entries.otherescort_1: If you're looking for someone, I'm not him.
entries.dontknowyou_1: Sorry, friend, I'm a little busy at the moment.
entries.npc_breech_1: Do you have a package for me?
entries.npc_smuggle_1: I suppose I could reschedule my inspection. I didn't really want to go slogging all the way to that plant anyway.
entries.gotowork_1: Didn't you bring the package? I guess that means I actually have to do my job.
entries.notit_1: Perhaps you meant to give me a different item.
entries.player_reset_1: I'm not comfortable with this job.
entries.player_3_1: What sort of headaches are the Gungans causing you?
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_2: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_3: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_3: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_4: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_4: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_5: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_5: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_6: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_6: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.npc_reset_2: See me again when you're up to doing the job.
entries.npc_reset_3: See me again when you're up to doing the job.
entries.npc_reset_4: See me again when you're up to doing the job.
entries.npc_reset_5: See me again when you're up to doing the job.
entries.npc_reset_6: See me again when you're up to doing the job.
